item.title: Ionic Defender
item.description: This was a game created by the Team Ionic Defender in the HomeTeamGameDev Outpost group. It was a very experience where people from many different timezones and countries worked together asynchronously to create this game. All the assests were created by the team members. Release https://hometeamgamedev.itch.io/ionic-defender
